text: Harry Corpening Martin (January 13, 1920 â€“ May 3, 2015) was an American judge. He served as the Associate Justice of the North Carolina Supreme Court, serving from 1982 to 1992. He was born in Lenoir, North Carolina. Marin died on May 3, 2015 in Asheville, North Carolina, aged 95. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American judges Category:Politicians from North Carolina Category:People from Asheville, North Carolina
